attributes.action: raise Leyla Zana’s case with the Turkish authorities and seek her immediate and unconditional release.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To this day, The Kurdish Question still remains unsolved and denied by the Turkish authorities despite unofficial international recognition of the Kurdish Freedom Struggle in Turkey as a legitimate struggle of an oppressed people for their basic human and political rights.

I call upon the international community to help Mrs. Zana - She is being penalized for exercising her right to freedom of expression and association. Her arrest is illegitmate and will not help the relations between the Turks and Kurds in anyway, rather ignite more hate and violence in the community.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
